features.title: Make Music Fast. Let the Algorithm Do the Rest.
features.description: Let go of the hustle. Eilumi AI composes your music and masters viral algorithms for you—so you can stay in your creative flow!

features.title: One-Tap Music Creation
features.description: Generate a complete song or instrumental track in seconds—AI transforms ideas into full compositions effortlessly

features.title: Turn Music Into Income
features.description: Earn royalties as your songs stream or license them for creators, content, and games. You own every track and can sell beats, loops, or hooks directly.

features.title: The AI-powered Viral Engine
features.description: Introducing Viral Score—a one-click AI prediction of your track's viral potential on TikTok, Reels, or Shorts. Trained on thousands of trends, it analyzes structure, energy, and hooks. Use the score to tweak your track or guide your content strategy.

features.title: Seamless Distribution & Sharing
features.description: Publish your music to Spotify, Apple Music, TikTok, and more with one-click distribution—no label or aggregator needed. Your tracks go straight to where your audience listens.

features.title: Upload Your Own Voice & Lyrics
features.description: Customize your songs by uploading original vocals and lyrics for a truly personalized experience.

features.title: Ready-to-Use Beats & Instrumentals
features.description: Access an extensive collection of beats across genres and moods to craft the perfect backing for your songs or instrumental tracks.

featuresWithImages.title: Transform Your Musical Ideas into Viral Hits with AI Precision
featuresWithImages.description: Eilumi AI helps you create share-worthy tracks with AI, optimized to match social trends and sound like hits—without the production hassle.

features.title: Instant AI-Powered Song Creation
features.description: Compose songs instantly using AI-driven prompts and beat selection. AI transforms your ideas into polished songs and instrumental tracks in seconds.
checklist: Generate complete songs and tracks in seconds with AI-assisted composition.
Select from multiple genres and moods for unique soundscapes.

testimonials.title: A Global Movement of Viral Music Makers
testimonials.description: Join thousands of creators using AI to craft hit-ready tracks, generate viral clips, and let the algorithm do the heavy lifting.

col1.name: Alex M.
col1.text: Eilumi AI isn't just a music app—it's my AI co-producer, helping me bring my song ideas to life effortlessly!

col2.name: Mia Anderson
col2.text: I love how I can upload my own vocals and let AI turn them into something incredible. It's like having a virtual producer in my pocket.

col3.name: Jason Keppler
col3.text: As a rapper, having access to instant beats and seamless autotune helps me create and experiment faster than ever. Eilumi AI is a must-have!

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Got questions? We've got you covered—find all the answers here!

faq.question: What makes Eilumi AI different from other music creation apps?
faq.answer:
Unlike any other music app, Eilumi is your AI-powered viral launchpad.

From vocals and lyrics to full tracks and short-form clips, our Viral Engine transforms raw ideas into share-worthy songs in seconds. With AI tools for beat selection, harmonization, hook generation, and trend optimization, you don't need to master production—or the algorithm. Just bring your creativity—we'll amplify it.

faq.question: Do I need to know anything about music marketing?
faq.answer: Nope. Eilumi AI is built for artists who want to create, not market. Our AI handles everything that makes music trend—from structure to social format.

faq.question: What if I don't understand trends?
faq.answer: That's the point. Our Viral Engine and TrendSignal study social platforms in real time and adjust your music output for you. You focus on your art—we'll help it rise.

faq.question: Can I use my own lyrics and vocals?
faq.answer: Yes! Upload your original vocals and lyrics to customize your music. Your AI co-producer helps bring them to life.

faq.question: Is Eilumi AI suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: Absolutely! No prior music production knowledge is needed—just your creativity, and Eilumi AI does the rest.

faq.question: Can I share my music?
faq.answer: Yes! Export and share your tracks instantly to social media or collaborate with other artists.
